unnormalised: Nwngsimon, jwng tailoring hwnna hagraobw, mainwi janainai lwkhi samjwng yaadmwnglana raokhwo. Nwngsima bwst (inch o, misal hisape 34"), waist (jwng 28" sanwnw), aro hip (38" gwrbwthang) lagwnw. Gotho bwthwkhwo, misal hisape 15 cm, aro baaosor gwrbwthang, gwrbwthangsan 22 inch 3/4th baaosorni jwno bw lagwnw. Aroi zarwiyaari gsthaini gwrbwthang - kurta jwno 40" jaoinw jaoyeba sothwng jabwna jaoyeba, blouse jwno 20 cm jaoinw. Bebwma nungthwkhwo mwjang mwjang lagwmwnw! Mwjang thango!
normalised: Hoy bisora, jwng nwngsimang silainaa hwthumnai dwbai thikhaya, manwn manwn bwikhongkho mwnnayw thagwmnathi. Nwngsimang bwst (inchiyao, mingwnbli gwsinay inchi) lagwnw, waist (jwngni gwsinay inchi), arw hip (gwsinay inchi dwmwi). Khwndwi bwthwrni bwikhongkho bwjabyabwi, jwngni gwmbla fongsein centimitarao, arw sleevni gwthang, zwngni zwissa inchi swmblaba thwisa bagwina. Bwswngni gwthangkhwo bwjabyabwi - kurta bagwina gwsina inchi ba swrang, zwngni zwissa centimitar, blaws bagwina. Bwikhongkwo thik mwnnaima bwswngni jwbwnni bwkhri jabai! Mwjang manw!

Gotho bwthwkhwo, misal hisape 15 cm, aro baaosor gwrbwthang, gwrbwthangsan 22 inch 3/4th baaosorni jwno bw lagwnw. Aroi zarwiyaari gsthaini gwrbwthang - kurta jwno 40" jaoinw jaoyeba sothwng jabwna jaoyeba, blouse jwno 20 cm jaoinw. Bebwma nungthwkhwo mwjang mwjang lagwmwnw! Mwjang thango!
